title: Russell Coutts on Improved Televising of America's Cup (Audio)
itunes:title: Russell Coutts on Improved Televising of America's Cup (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Sailing legend Sir Russell Coutts, CEO of the America's Cup Event Authority (ACEA), the organizing body for the 35th America's Cup, on the 2017 America's Cup in Bermuda.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
